item.title: Flight Interface
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

Hey guys, I am making a server from scratch and I need to know how I can make a flight interface if it is possible. By this I mean talk to a Gnome Pilot and the interface will appear with a map and text box saying “where would you like to go?”. I want some of the options to be Staff Zone, Draggonarths, Fun PK 1vs1 and Multi, And Dragons. Does anyone knows how to make a interface like this come up or can you make one for me? As I said before I am making this server from scratch and my coding is I believe what is used in Deltascape.
For example

if (isInAssault()){ sM("You can't follow in assault!"); return; }

Read full topic
